toppings.name: Bok Choy
toppings.description: A fresh, blanched green that works with nearly every ramen style—soupy or dry, mild or spicy. It adds crispness, balance, and a hint of sweetness to any bowl.

toppings.name: Corn
toppings.description: Corn brings that sweet, juicy hit every bowl deserves. Classic Japanese add-on that crushes it in any noodle style.

toppings.name: Kimchi
toppings.description: Fermented Korean side dish bringing bold, tangy heat. Punches up Shin-style broths or cuts through creamy hacks.

toppings.name: Green Peas
toppings.description: An underrated winner. Adds snappy sweetness to creamy, cheesy hacks like Buldak Carbonara.

toppings.name: Mushroom
toppings.description: Earthy umami bomb. Pre-sautéed for max flavor in brothy ramens or dry noodle hacks.

toppings.name: Jalapeños
toppings.description: Lightly pickled and always FREE. Clean heat with a tangy twist to cut through rich broths.

toppings.name: Mayonnaise (House)
toppings.description: A true ramen secret weapon. Levels up brothy bowls and dry hacks with savory richness.

toppings.name: Mayonnaise (Kewpie)
toppings.description: The premium standard for rich, creamy mayo hacks.

toppings.name: Butter
toppings.description: Simple but game-changing. Adds instant richness and silky mouthfeel to spicy broths or dry noodles.

toppings.name: Soy Sauce
toppings.description: Clean, salty, and deeply savory. A splash of soy sauce enhances broth, boosts dry noodles, and unifies your toppings with classic umami. Always FREE at UUDU.

toppings.name: Chili Oil (House)
toppings.description: Our house chili oil brings smooth, savory heat perfect for mixing into any broth or dry noodle hack.

toppings.name: Chili Oil (Lao Gan Ma)
toppings.description: The cult-favorite chili crisp loaded with crunchy bits and bold umami punch.

toppings.name: Rocket Booster # 1
toppings.description: UUDU’s house-made flavor bomb crafted from a medley of scallions, ginger, Haday soy sauce, and other savory elements. Built to wake up dry noodles with depth and aroma.

toppings.name: Rocket Booster # 2
toppings.description: A creamy, slightly tangy flavor charger built from mayo, sriracha, ponzu, and other savory components. Mellows out spicy Korean soup noodles or adds rich balance to Japanese sauce-based bowls.

toppings.name: Rocket Booster # 3
toppings.description: Coming soon.

toppings.name: Rocket Booster # 4
toppings.description: Coming soon.

toppings.name: Lime
toppings.description: Bright, tangy, and irresistibly zesty. Squeeze it in to cut the heat and mellow out bold flavors.

toppings.name: Mozzarella Cheese
toppings.description: Fun, gooey texture for dry-style noodles or savory upgrade to brothy favorites.

toppings.name: Mexican Blend Cheese
toppings.description: A big time SoCal cheese move—this beloved blend offers bolder, sharper flavor perfect for rich, creamy hacks or spicy ramen upgrades. Shredded thin, it melts fast—coating your noodz in a smooth, velvety finish.

toppings.name: Flamin’ Hot Cheetos Crumble
toppings.description: Viral status justified—this fiery red crunch delivers an intense, tangy, cheesy explosion that turns any ramen into a snack-culture flex. A bold topping fearless hackers can’t resist.

toppings.name: Green Onion
toppings.description: Green onion brings crispness and vibrant color. The most popular ramen topping.

toppings.name: Egg - Hard Boiled; Plain
toppings.description: The no-fuss protein hero. Drop it whole or smash the yolk into broth.

toppings.name: Egg - Soft Boiled; Ramen Style
toppings.description: The classic ramen egg with that iconic jammy yolk.

toppings.name: Egg - Extra Crispy
toppings.description: Blistered, golden crust with soft yolk inside. A bold twist.

toppings.name: Stir Fried Fish Cake
toppings.description: Flat strips of tasty Korean fish cake, lightly sautéed for savory depth.

toppings.name: Korean Mini Smokies
toppings.description: Juicy, smoky bite-sized sausages packed with umami.

toppings.name: Lap Cheong Sausage
toppings.description: Chinese classic with sweet-savory punch. Rich, tender, and slightly smoky.

toppings.name: Crispy Pork Egg Roll
toppings.description: Golden, crunchy, and packed with savory pork and veggies.

toppings.name: K-Spam Crunch
toppings.description: Thick, juicy Spam coated in a golden, fluffy batter loaded with crispy ramen bits.

toppings.name: Fish Balls with Egg Roe
toppings.description: Bouncy fish balls filled with rich, creamy egg roe that bursts with savory umami.
